ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Security research and testing of credential extraction techniques on Windows systems, particularly in environments with Credential Guard enabled.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Extracts NTLMv1 hashes from user sessions. â€¢ Bypasses local Credential Guard using the Remote Credential Guard protocol. â€¢ Supports dumping own session credentials without elevated privileges (requires SPN account). â€¢ Supports dumping all session credentials with SYSTEM privileges (requires SPN account).
ðŸ“– Summary: DumpGuard is a proof-of-concept C tool designed to extract NTLMv1 credential hashes from modern Windows systems. It leverages the Remote Credential Guard protocol to bypass local Credential Guard protections, enabling credential dumping even when Credential Guard is enabled.
